pycwa 0.1.1
  • Reference

Calculate overall activity summary from epoch data

Source: R/reader2.R
activity_summary.Rd

Calculate overall activity summary from epoch data

activity_summary(
  epochFile,
  nonWearFile = NULL,
  outputFolder = NULL,
  verbose = FALSE,
  timeZone = "Europe/London",
  timeShift = 0,
  startTime = NULL,
  endTime = NULL,
  epochPeriod = 30L,
  stationaryStd = 13L,
  mgCutPointMVPA = 100L,
  mgCutPointVPA = 425L,
  minNonWearDuration = 60L,
  useRecommendedImputation = TRUE,
  activityClassification = TRUE,
  activityModel = c("walmsley-nov20", "doherty-may20", "willetts-may20"),
  model_dir = NULL,
  psd = TRUE,
  fourierFrequency = TRUE,
  fourierWithAcc = TRUE,
  m10l5 = FALSE
)

Arguments

epochFile

Input csv.gz file of processed epoch data
nonWearFile

Output filename for non wear .csv.gz episodes
outputFolder

folder for all of the output files
verbose

print diagnostic messages
timeZone

timezone in country/city format to be used for daylight savings crossover check
timeShift

time shift to be applied, e.g. -15 will shift the device internal time by -15 minutes. Not to be confused with timezone offsets.
startTime

removes data before this time (local) in the final analysis
endTime

removes data after this time (local) in the final analysis
epochPeriod

length in seconds of a single epoch
stationaryStd

stationary mg threshold
mgCutPointMVPA

MVPA threshold for cut point based activity definition
mgCutPointVPA

VPA threshold for cut point based activity
minNonWearDuration

Minimum duration of nonwear events (minutes)
useRecommendedImputation

Highly recommended method to impute missing data using data from other days around the same time
activityClassification

Use pre-trained random forest to predict activity type
activityModel

trained activity model .tar file. If a file is passed, then it will be used, otherwise, it will be passed to download_activity_model
model_dir

directory to download model to, passed to outdir in download_activity_model
psd

Calculate power spectral density for 24 hour circadian period
fourierFrequency

Calculate dominant frequency of sleep for circadian rhythm analysis
fourierWithAcc

Do the Fourier analysis of circadian rhythms (for PSD and Fourier Frequency) with acceleration data instead of sleep signal
m10l5

Calculate relative amplitude of most and least active acceleration periods for circadian rhythm analysis

Value

A list of data

Details

Get overall activity summary from input epoch file. This is achieved by

  1. get interrupt and data error summary vals

  2. check if data occurs at a daylight savings crossover

  3. calculate wear-time statistics, and write nonWear episodes to file

  4. predict activity from features, and add label column

  5. calculate imputation values to replace nan PA metric values

  6. calculate empirical cumulative distribution function of vector magnitudes

  7. derive main movement summaries (overall, weekday/weekend, and hour)

Examples

epoch_file =  system.file("extdata", "ax3_testfile-epoch.csv.gz",
    package = "pycwa")
# \donttest{
  if (pycwa:::have_python_requirements()) {
    sums = pycwa::activity_summary(epoch_file, model_dir = tempdir(), verbose = 2)
  }

#> Warning: pycwa may not work:  packages not found, please try to install using reticulate::py_install(NULL)
# }
